mapper.select: select group_concat(concat(jsh_material.`Name`,' ',jsh_material.Model)) as mName from jsh_depotitem inner join jsh_material on jsh_depotitem.MaterialId = jsh_material.Id and ifnull(jsh_material.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' where jsh_depotitem.HeaderId = #{id} and ifnull(jsh_depotitem.delete_Flag,'0') !='1'

select distinct dh.*, s.supplier supplier from jsh_depothead dh left join jsh_supplier s on dh.OrganId=s.id and ifnull(s.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' where 1=1 and dh.Type=#{Type} and dh.SubType=#{SubType};
